item.title: Hamas says it will continue releasing Israeli hostages under Gaza deal
item.description: The statement comes as mediators Egypt and Qatar work hard to salvage the ceasefire with Israel.

item.title: Ukraine war talks start now, Trump says after Putin call
item.description: The US and Russia leaders spoke over the phone after Trump said Nato membership for Ukraine is unlikely.

item.title: Grenade attack in French bar injures 12
item.description: The motive is not clear but investigators say it "may be linked to a settling of scores".

item.title: â‚¬5m worth of cocaine seized in Kildare
item.description: Approximately 72 kilos of cocaine was discovered following a stop and search in the Allenwood area of Kildare

item.title: Hundreds of foreigners freed from Myanmar's scam centres
item.description: Thai Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra has pledged to close scam centres along the Thai-Myanmar border.
